an3.148:1.1: “Someone with three qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there. …
an3.148:1.2: Unethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …
an3.148:2.1: Someone with three qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there. …
an3.148:2.2: Ethical deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. …”
